title: BRIEF-India's Mahindra And Mahindra Exec Says JV With Ford Will Increase Sourcing From India To $7 Bln
text:
© Reuters. BRIEF-India's Mahindra And Mahindra Exec Says JV With Ford Will Increase Sourcing From India To $7 Bln

Oct 1 (Reuters) - FORD MOTOR AND INDIA'S MAHINDRA AND MAHINDRA EXECS SAY:

* JV WITH MAHINDRA AND MAHINDRA PLACES INDIA AT THE VERY CENTRE OF FORD'S INTERNATIONAL STRATEGY

* JV WILL INCREASE SOURCING FROM INDIA TO $7 BILLION FROM AROUND $5.5 BILLION

* JV WILL ENSURE WE WILL NOT HAVE TO INVEST IN ANY NEW CAPACITY

* JV WILL HAVE TOTAL 1.2 MILLION CAPACITY

* JV WILL HAVE TOTAL ANNUAL PRODUCTION CAPACITY OF 1.2 MILLION VEHICLES

* ENTERPRISE VALUE OF JV IS AT 19.25 BILLION RUPEES

* MGMT WILL BE INDUCTED BY MAHINDRA IN NEW JV APPROVED BY FORD

* WILL LOOK AT COMMON PLATFORMS ACROSS MAHINDRA, FORD AND SSANGYONG MOTOR

* NEW JV COMPANY WILL HAVE 14% COMBINED MARKET SHARE

* NEW JV COMPANY WILL BE EBITDA POSITIVE FROM FIRST DAY ITSELF

* IN THE PROCESS OF DECIDING ON BUILDING AN ELECTRIC VEHICLE ON FORD'S CAR PLATFORM

* THERE WILL BE NO JOINT BRANDING UNDER THE JV

* THERE WILL BE NO JOB LOSSES BECAUSE OF JV Further company coverage: F.N
description: BRIEF-India's Mahindra And Mahindra Exec Says JV With Ford Will Increase Sourcing From India To $7 Bln
